name: 6 Ways to Die
description:
"You've asked for too many actions during a DnD game..
Now, the game master is upset !
Instead of asking you to throw a dice :
he attacks your character with a giant dice !"
________________________________________

Your goal is to survive for as long as you can against a god mode dice here to end your party! Each time the dice moves, it attacks differently depending on the face it rolls into.

The cubic dice can activate 6 different effects depending on the dots:

A game made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 by a team of 7

DEVELOPEMENT
Adinimys, Sir Tetris , Boo

ART & ANIMATION
Finnston , Sothar

MUSIC & SOUND
Lyckstolp, Albin
